title: START_VEHICLE_HORN
content:
0x9C8C6504B5B63D2C0x0DF5ADB3// StartVehicleHorn
void START_VEHICLE_HORN(Vehicle vehicle, int duration, Hash mode, BOOL forever);Parameters:vehicle: Vehicle idduration: The duration to sound the horn, in milliseconds.mode: The hash of "NORMAL" or "HELDDOWN". Can be 0.forever: Sounds the horn for the specified vehicle. Note that if a player is in the vehicle, it will only sound briefly.
codeBlocks:
// StartVehicleHorn
void START_VEHICLE_HORN(Vehicle vehicle, int duration, Hash mode, BOOL forever);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for START_VEHICLE_HORN
StartVehicleHorn(vehicle, 0, 0, true)
